EmailTemplate.description: 10 days after the Shipping Date and the Status of the Experience is not “Completed Experience”
EmailTemplate.name: PJ ByFor Experience TEmail Notify that the parcel had been shipped 7 days ago
EmailTemplate.subject: By&For: Order tracking Client
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.OwnerFullName},
For your information, the bottles have been delivered 7 days ago and it seems that the client {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.Name} hasn't been received them yet. Could you please update the situation on application?
Kindest regards,
By&For Team
